title: 3 and Out - Burrow & Chase Domination, Antonio Brown Groundhog Day, CFB and Rose Bowl Reaction
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Burrow & Chase Domination, Antonio Brown Groundhog Day, CFB and Rose Bowl Reaction
description:
John reacts to Joe Burrow and Ja'Marr Chase's dominant performance in their AFC North clinching win over the Chiefs, explains why Mike Vrabel deserves more credit, his take on Antonio Brown's latest and probably last NFL meltdown, and the glaring weakness he saw with Ohio State despite their Rose Bowl win.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
